data.text: @alina01534637 For sure. It is a ghost town in my red state. I am pretty sure I just saw a tumbleweed blow down the street.

@EatSleepMask Is gonna be cray cray, the hospital flooded with unmask anti-vax who shouldn’t have the privilege of seeing a dr. They had plenty of time to get vaccinated and boosted. I believe that in the upcoming weeks NY population will be reduced drastically 😩
@alina01534637 You may consider locking down for your safety. I cannot believe New York City is going in this direction.

@EatSleepMask Good advice as always. Although since next week when NY is dropping the mask mandate our days are numbered. I will keep masking until I die and even when i die I will wear a mask, just in case…imagine if I wasn’t vaccinated and boosted 😱 the horror
@alina01534637 I would order a double booster just to be safe.

@EatSleepMask I know we are playing Russian roulette here but sometimes we take the risk. Tomorrow we go and get our booster, i made the appointment already. I really hope we didn’t push our luck too much, especially in NY!
@alina01534637 Damn you! This is too adorable for me to say anything sarcastic about it. https://t.co/2Pj7fn2m6q
@EatSleepMask Not anymore, at our table we have everyone from everywhere 🥰 https://t.co/iPo44rWItV
